t: A Song{H7892} of degrees{H4609} of David{H1732}. If{H3884} it had not been the LORD{H3068} who was on our side, now may Israel{H3478} say{H559}{(H8799)};
If{H3884} it had not been the LORD{H3068} who was on our side, when men{H120} rose up{H6965}{(H8800)} against us:
Then{H233} they had swallowed us up{H1104}{(H8804)} quick{H2416}, when their wrath{H639} was kindled{H2734}{(H8800)} against us:
Then{H233} the waters{H4325} had overwhelmed{H7857}{(H8804)} us, the stream{H5158} had gone over{H5674}{(H8804)} our soul{H5315}:
Then{H233} the proud{H2121} waters{H4325} had gone over{H5674}{(H8804)} our soul{H5315}.
Blessed{H1288}{(H8803)} be the LORD{H3068}, who hath not given{H5414}{(H8804)} us as a prey{H2964} to their teeth{H8127}.
Our soul{H5315} is escaped{H4422}{(H8738)} as a bird{H6833} out of the snare{H6341} of the fowlers{H3369}{(H8802)}: the snare{H6341} is broken{H7665}{(H8738)}, and we are escaped{H4422}{(H8738)}.
Our help{H5828} is in the name{H8034} of the LORD{H3068}, who made{H6213}{(H8802)} heaven{H8064} and earth{H776}.
